Description:
Californian Bungalow Plus Cottage on 1/4 Acre With Reservoir Views
First time on the market since 1940 this substantial Californian Bungalow with original features such as wide hallways, leadlight windows and spacious rooms with high ceilings. Typical of its era it is currently set out with two large bedrooms, sleep out, separate formal lounge, country style kitchen with scullery and internal bathroom and laundry facilities. Added to this is a self contained cottage which features, separate bedroom, combined kitchen lounge and combined bathroom/ laundry. Outside boasts a huge carport, separate lock up garage and other sundry shedding. The Property offers a solid base to renovate and perhaps extend (STCA) and make use of the fantastic water views of Kennington Reservoir and is truly a once in a lifetime opportunity.
Adjacent vacant allotment also available at Auction on Saturday 25th February at 12:15pm.
Insights: 45 Reservoir Road, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2012 and 74 other 3 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
Making Life Simple
In an optimal location, this impeccably presented brick veneer home boasts low-maintenance style living, and is now available to the market for the first time since it was built. Boasting three good sized bedrooms, comfortable lounge with adjoining dining and kitchen, gas heating, x 2 split systems for all year round comfort, one bathroom with bath, shower, vanity and separate toilet. Outside offers easy maintenance with single carport, separate workshop, neat and tidy established gardens. New carpet throughout, new fencing, so there is no more to do other then move in unpack and enjoy this property in this great convenient location.
Craig Webster : 0408 332 445

Description:
Perfectly Presented - 2 Bedroom Unit in Kennington
Fantastic opportunity to secure a meticulously kept front unit, set in sought after Kennington on a level lot. This unit is well located handy to shops, bus, primary school and adjacent to Kennington oval. Outside is a manicured, secure private garden that offers a tranquil outdoor area sure to impress all and generously sized carport. Inside this immaculately kept home are all the space style features you'll need to live comfortably with stainless steel kitchen appliances, evaporative as well as refrigerated air conditioning and gas ducted heating ensure year round comfort. Large main bedroom with BIRs, 3 piece bathroom and delightful north facing living area offering loads of natural light. All with generously proportioned lounge room and open plan living make this a comfortable and practical home.
Damien O'Shannessy : 0417 055 593

Description:
Great Investment Close To La Trobe Uni
Located within minutes to La Trobe University, Strath Hill and Strath Village shopping centres and Kennington Reservoir is this spacious unit offering all the essentials for comfortable living. The property features large lounge room with reverse cycle split system, 2 bedrooms with BIRs and ceiling fan, separate laundry.
A rear courtyard and single carport complete this great package.
Looking for a great investment or first home close to the Uni and Strathdale amenities?
Well, this property could be just what you're looking for.

Description:
The Owner's Pride and Joy - Come See for Yourself
If ever a house was presented accordingly inside and out, then look no further than this updated 3 bedroom weatherboard home.
Literally 500m walking distance to Strath Hill & Strath Village Shopping Centres, and under 1 km to La Trobe uni, this home ticks all the boxes for a variety of buyers.
All 3 bedrooms have BIRs and the kitchen/meals/family room are all in an open living area. There are updates galore in the kitchen with new fixtures and fittings, whilst the 3pce bathroom has had huge improvements made, plus there's a handy walk in linen cupboard in the renovated laundry.
Comfort is assured with S/System Heating/Cooling and also a gas heater.
Outside is a huge block with a double carport and underhouse workshop/storage area.
Kids can play freely in the established, secure yard.
Don't delay as this will not last.
This is one of the best displays of a beloved family home!
Nekti Tzouroutis : 0412 242 321

Architecturally designed this home comprises three generous size bedrooms with built in robes. Fully equipped kitchen. Spacious lounge-room. North facing verandah with views. Ducted gas heating and Split System Air-Conditioning. Double garage. On a fully landscaped allotment, a short walk to Strath Hill shopping complex while being only 5 mins from Bendigos CBD.
Insights: 74 other 3 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
Walk to Strath Village or La Trobe University
This original three bedroom brick veneer home offers a rare but great buying opportunity in a highly sought after location close to all ameneties one would desire. Walk to University, Strath Village & Strath Hill shopping, primary or secondary schools, or enjoy Kennington reservoir and so much more, you will be love the convenience of this location. The home is a spacious three bedrooms, comfortable lounge with gas heating adjoins the kitchen dining room with gas wall furnace and a/c unit, ample storage throughout, great double garage plus room for workshop all located on a great sized allotment. If you are searching for a home to live in or an investment property then this is well worth an inspection.
Craig Webster : 0408 332 445

Description:
Affordable In Kennington
Situated in the highly sort after suburb of Kennington and only a short drive to Strath Village Shopping Centre, Latrobe University and the heart of Town is this well presented 3 bdrm Weatherboard.
Set on a generous allotment, this property has loads of potential and will suit the renovator, first home buyer, investor or those simply wanting to live in the best suburbs of Bendigo.
Features:
Updated Kitchen (4 years ago), Polished Boards throughout, Gas Heater, A/C, Terracotta Tiles and plenty of room to extend to the rear.
Property has recently been re-plumbed, re-wired, re-stumped (concrete) and re-guttered.
Don't miss this opportunity to buy your own patch in the heart of Kennington.

Description:
3 Large Strata- Titled Units in Kennington
Situated on the east boundary of Harry Trott Oval are these three strata titled units - each available through a separate sale.
Each Units feature 2 spacious Bdrms with BIR's,
large open plan and generous rear yard.
Only a short drive to town and to the ever expanding Latrobe University and a fifty meter stroll to Lowndes Street Shop Precinct which includes Take Away, Pharmacy, Hair Salon and Butcher.
For those seeking public transport nearby - a bus stop just around the corner in Skene St.
Floor plan lends itself to relocation of internal wall to add an extra bedroom.
Don't miss this opportunity!

Description:
BLUE CHIP LOCATION WITH TRIPLE GARAGING
When position counts, you've got it all with this prime location.
Tucked away in a quiet Court, only a few minutes walk from Strath Village Shopping Centre, Kennington Reservoir, Doctor, Physio, and Podiatrist. Let's also boast that living in this delightful home will mean that you are in the correct zoning to attend the most popular Secondary College in Bendigo.
The delightful design can be closed off for 2 seperate living spaces, or opened to enjoy great entertaining spaces, including a built in bar.
In total there are 4 bedrooms, the main bedroom suite is spacious and offers an ensuite and roomy walk in robe.
With central heating and cooling, dishwasher, new wall oven, decorative cornice, high ceilings and a feature plaster niche, this home will appeal to you.
Insights: 5 David Court, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2020 and 26 other 4 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
BLUE CHIP LOCATION WITH TRIPLE GARAGING
When position counts, you've got it all with this prime location.
Tucked away in a quiet Court, only a few minutes walk from Strath Village Shopping Centre, Kennington Reservoir, Doctor, Physio, and Podiatrist. Let's also boast that living in this delightful home will mean that you are in the correct zoning to attend the most popular Secondary College in Bendigo.
The delightful design can be closed off for 2 seperate living spaces, or opened to enjoy great entertaining spaces, including a built in bar.
In total there are 4 bedrooms, the main bedroom suite is spacious and offers an ensuite and roomy walk in robe.
With central heating and cooling, dishwasher, new wall oven, decorative cornice, high ceilings and a feature plaster niche, this home will appeal to you.
Kaye Lazenby : 0407 843 167

Description:
Love the location
When looking for a property everybody tells you it's 'location, location, location!' So look no further than this fantastic unit situated in the heart of Kennington, siuated midway between the CBD and Latrobe University and close to bus stops, primary and secondary schools, supermarket and shops. This unit, unlike alot of units is open, bright and inviting, two generous bedrooms, huge lounge/dining and easy flow kitchen.
Currently owner occupied, this property is ideal for many, owner occupier - investor - Student accomadation. Not too many properties like this one appear on the market to often, so arrange an inspection today.
Dale Boyd : 0419 382 053

Description:
Unbeatable Location
Built in 1961, this beautifully kept home is now offered for sale for the first time.
Situated in a quiet street in Kennington and sitting in a very affordable price bracket, the property will be well received by investors and owner-occupiers alike.
Features include: 3 bedrooms (1 with huge BIR's) , large lounge with heating & cooling, recently updated kitchen, 2nd living area/rumpus room.
Outside we have well kept gardens, a shady and spacious backyard and a single garage with concrete floor and power.
Inspect now.
Jesse Gardner : 0428 310 893
